headline: Is Trending Stock Amgen Inc. (AMGN) a Buy Now?

headline: AMGN's Key Drugs Repatha, Evenity & Blincyto Drive Q1 Sales Growth
summary: AMGN's 14 products, including Repatha, Blincyto, Tezspire, Tavneos and Evenity, achieve double-digit volume growth in the first quarter.
